rules_text:
Enchant land
When Gift of Deadwoods enters, mill three cards, then return a creature or land card milled this way to your hand.
At the beginning of combat on each player's turn, if you're ancient, you may have enchanted land become a 4/4 Elemental creature until end of turn. It's still a land. [i](You're ancient as long as you have eight or more total lands in play or in your graveyard.)[/i]
